analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x295b13831dc5c5df5e0ed3df874d9be83c79ac15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x295b13831dc5c5df5e0ed3df874d9be83c79ac15.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x295b13831dc5c5df5e0ed3df874d9be83c79ac15.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
